name: Shot Online
description: Shot-Online is not just an online sports game either, but it is a highly accurate simulation and a deep role-playing experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS 7 Processor: Pentium 2.0Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce FX 5700 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WINDOWS 7 Processor: Pentium 3.0Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce FX 8800 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
